author: dgraham
msg: Added scriptLanguage property to the form and javascript tags for PR# 17234.
This property is ignored in XHTML mode but allows developers to turn off
the "language" attribute of <script> tags in HTML.

author: dgraham
msg: Turned the htmlBeginComment and htmlEndComment into constants

author: dgraham
msg: Fixed exception handling for PR# 13279.  Instead of swallowing exceptions
or printing the stack trace on the page, the exceptions are logged and
rethrown as JspException for the page error handling mechanism to

author: dgraham
msg: More code cleanup, removed deprecated method, deprecated ROLE_DELIMITER
because it is only used internally to this class.
